name: Lenny Nero
description: Nero is a well knownXBDdealer that has agreements with various individuals, such asJotaro Shobo,GottfridandFredrik Persson, as well as theScavengers. At some point he ceased accepting goods from the Persson duo, as he felt they were taking it too far, and that Gottfrid was dragging his son too far into it. Though he accepted their final payment, he would not deal with them again. In2077, he would be approached byVfor his involvement in the disappearance ofEvelyn Parker, as he was in possession of anXBDthat featured her being recorded by Scavengers.
